name: Let's Fart Brandon: Black And White
name_original: Let's Fart Brandon: Black And White
description:
Let's Fart Brandon : Black And White is a free funny comedy game featuring Mr Biden and his infamous farts.

The Story:

Mr. Biden falls asleep at a conference and has nightmares. In the world of his nightmare, his only weapon is fart.

Game Features:

  • Funny top down action comedy gameplay
  • Easy to pick up and play
  • For fans of fun and comedy games
  • Suitable for both female and male players
  • Good graphic with stable performance on older PCs
  • Unique surreal nightmare world with sense of humor
  • Classic comedy black and white style

Color version:

https://hammergames.itch.io/lets-fart-brandon

Online browser version:

https://hammergames-browser.itch.io/lets-fart-brandon-browser
